name: GuideDogsNSWACT
0:
”Alexa, open Guide Dogs”
”Alexa, ask Guide Dogs for news”
”Alexa, ask Guide Dogs for newsletters”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: guide dogs
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Guide Dogs assists people living with low vision or blindness to access the support and tools required to live an independent life. This skill uses voice as another channel for Clients to connect with Guide Dogs to find out more about the services they provide, to keep up to date with the latest news and find information on how to raise and train puppies so they may become potential future Guide Dogs.

Tell Alexa to “Open Guide Dogs” to access Guide Dogs news, events, the Puppy Raising Manual Wizard and services, which includes information regarding:

• Orientation and Mobility
• Occupational Therapy
• Low Vision Services
• Assistive Technology
• Connections Services 

You can arrange a call back from the Guide Dogs friendly Helpdesk team if you require more information. 

You will need to be a registered Puppy Raser to access the Puppy Raising Manual Wizard. Please contact the Gude Dogs team on puppyraising@guidedogs.com.au, or 1800 484 333.

For more information on Guide Dogs services, you can also contact our team by emailing info@guidedogs.com.au or calling 1800 484 333.

The information in this skill is provided for educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial 000 or your local emergency response phone number.
